gemini_config.system_instruction: I'll give you food, tell me its ayurveda dosha composition, in the typical up / down arrow (e.g. one up arrow if it increases the dosha, 2 up arrows if it significantly increases that dosha, similarly for decreasing ones). That's all I want to know, nothing else. Only provide the arrows.

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""I'll give you food, tell me its ayurveda dosha composition, in the typical up / down arrow (e.g. one..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
